name: Moto Raptor: Jurassic Dinosaur
description:
Become the most awesome velociraptor of all time ridding your motorbike through the jurassic style park!
Overtake the slow dinosaurs with your new chopper and be the coolest raptor ever! The T-Rex and the Triceratops will never catch you!

If you love dinosaur games and motorbikes, this is the game you've been waiting for!

As you go faster and further you will win cash and you'll be able to buy better and faster motorbikes! Red chopper? A cool blue dirt bike? Win the race buying the best motorbikes on this dinosaur racing game!

You can overtake the other dinosaurs and you will win more points and more cash! Also, you can take the ramp to jump and activate the turbo! The T-Rex, triceratops and other dinosaurs will never be as fast! And they don’t have cool bikes.

There's no time to lose! Choose your chopper or dirt bike and show the other dinosaurs who is the king of the jurassic style park! Velociraptor? No, no… MotoRaptor baby!

◉ KEY FEATURES ◉

- Awesome motorbikes! Chopper and dirt bikes!
- Velociraptor, T-Rex, Triceratops and more!
- Very simple controls!
- Incredible graphics!
- Leaderboards and achievements!
- Awesome jurassic music!
- Free!

◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

◉ TIPS ◉

- The faster you drive the more points you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake dinosaurs closely to get bonus points and cash
- If you do overtakes fast, you can do combos and win more points
- Take the ramp to jump and activate the turbo!

Have endless fun by downloading this velociraptor and motorbikes racing game.

Do not forget to give us a review ;)
